content.text: Match ends, Everton 4, Aston Villa 0.
Second Half ends, Everton 4, Aston Villa 0.
Attempt missed. Romelu Lukaku (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Attempt blocked. Romelu Lukaku (Everton) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin Mirallas.
Jordan Veretout (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leon Osman (Everton).

Foul by Kieran Richardson (Aston Villa).
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Kevin Mirallas (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Darron Gibson.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Substitution, Everton. Darron Gibson replaces James McCarthy.
Foul by Carlos Sánchez (Aston Villa).
Leon Osman (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Brad Guzan.
